content:
ActorServiceRemotingDispatcher Constructor

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Remoting.Runtime
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll

In this Article

Instantiates the ActorServiceRemotingDispatcher that can dispatch messages to an actor service and to the actors hosted in the service..

public ActorServiceRemotingDispatcher (Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Runtime.ActorService actorService);
Parameters
actorService
ActorService

An actor service instance.
